thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel!!
thread.title_full: Great hotel!! - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MadeiraIsland
title: Great hotel!!
text:
Great hotel in a perfect location.
Stayed here on a superior room for family, 2 comfortable double beds as we were four, me, my wife and my 2 young boys.
Room on the 15th floor was very clean and comfortable, making us feel very relaxed.
Staff at the hotel is very pleasant and efficient.
The hotel is super well located, close to major attractions.
Quality/price I will in deed return!
Do try it.
